largest_dependencies.name: TBD
largest_dependencies.notes: MANUAL: Run bundle analyzer to identify

optimization_opportunities.description: MANUAL: Identify after running bundle analyzer

tree_shaking.notes: React Native 0.76.5 supports tree-shaking. Verify with bundle analyzer.

code_splitting.notes: No lazy loading or code splitting detected in current implementation

instructions.step_1: Install bundle visualizer: npm install --save-dev react-native-bundle-visualizer
instructions.step_2: Export bundles: npx expo export --platform all
instructions.step_4: Measure total size: du -sh dist/ (or dir dist /s on Windows)
instructions.step_5: Identify top 10 largest dependencies from visualizer HTML report
instructions.step_6: Check for duplicate dependencies (e.g., multiple React versions)
instructions.step_7: Note any unused modules that can be removed
instructions.step_9: Identify optimization opportunities (lazy loading, code splitting, etc.)
instructions.step_10: Update all null values with actual measurements

alternative_method.description: If react-native-bundle-visualizer fails, use Metro bundler output
alternative_method.command: npx react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios-bundle.js --sourcemap-output ios-bundle.map
alternative_method.notes: Analyze ios-bundle.js size and contents manually
